title: Create a reservation assignment
description: Create an assignment to map a project, folder, or organization to a BigQuery reservation.

objective.narrative: To manage costs and isolate performance, a developer can programmatically allocate BigQuery slots to a specific project. This is accomplished by creating an assignment that links the project to a reservation, which ensures all jobs originating from that project use the capacity of the associated reservation.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_assignment_create
regionTags.title: Create a reservation assignment
regionTags.description: Create an assignment to map a project, folder, or organization to a BigQuery reservation.
